resources.string: The LR01 uses the same design as the most iconic bikes from PEUGEOT Cycles\'\ 130-year history and combines it with agile, dynamic performance that\'\s perfectly suited to navigating today\'\s cities. As well as a lugged steel frame and iconic PEUGEOT black-and-white chequer design, this city bike also features a 16-speed Shimano Claris drivetrain.
